Haram

Billlie

Introduction

Haram is a South Korean singer signed under MYSTIC Story. She began her career under SM Entertainment before transitioning to the subsidiary label MYSTIC Story. Haram was officially introduced as a trainee on February 18, 2020.

She was a member of Mystic Rookies, which later evolved into the group Billlie. Haram made her debut with Billlie on November 10, 2021, with the release of their mini album "The Billage of Perception : Chapter One".
